trans-unit.source: Enable privacyIDEA authentication for TYPO3 backend users
Enable privacyIDEA authentication for TYPO3 frontend users
privacyIDEA Server URL: This is the base URL part of the privacyIDEA server. You do not need to add the trailing "validate/check" part.
Check certificate: We recommend that you always check the certificate in productive environments. Otherwise the authentication could suffer from a MitM attack.
Devlog: Write Debug Information to devlog
Pass to other authentication module:In case that privacyIDEA fails to authenticate the user the authentication request is passed to the next authentication module.
